original: phur srung gi gsol mchod rgyun khyer bzhugs /
analyzed: phur srung gi gsol mchod rgyun khyer bzhugs

original: stong pa'i ngang las b+han+d+ha'i snod du hu~m yig zhu ba las byung ba'i gtor ma sha khrag gi phung po 'dod yon gyi rol mo cir yang 'char ba zag pa med par gyur /
analyzed: stong ba ngang las b+han+d+ha snod du hu~m yig ju ba las byung ba thor ma sha khrag gi phung po dod yon gyi rol mo cir yang char ba zag ba med ba gyur

original: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bka' skyong 'khor dang bcas pa badzra sa ma ya dzah
analyzed: snying ga sa bon gyi d kyis bka skyong khor dang cha ba badzra sa ma ya dzah

original: badzra ki la ya d+harma pa la sa pa ri wa ra i dam ba ling ta kha kha kha hi kha hi /
analyzed: badzra ki la ya d+harma ba la sa ba ri wa ra i dam ba ling ta kha kha kha hi kha hi

original: hu~m/ bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yi //
analyzed: joms ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yi

original: bka' yi srung mar dam bcas shing //
analyzed: bka yi srung mar dam cha shing

original: dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i g.yar dam can //
analyzed: dkyil khor skyong ba g.yar dam can

original: shwa na bzhi dang bdag nyid ma //
analyzed: shwa na bzhi dang bdag nyid ma

original: sa bdag chen mo mched bzhi dang // bse lcags dung gi skyes bu bzhi //
analyzed: sa bdag chen mo mched bzhi dang bse lcags dung gi skye bu bzhi

original: dam can srung ma 'khor bcas rnams //
analyzed: dam can srung ma khor cha rnams

original: 'dir gshegs mthun rdzas mchod gtor bzhes //
analyzed: dir gshegs mthun rdzas mchod thor bzhes

original: 'gal rkyen zhi zhing mthun rkyen spel //
analyzed: gal rkyen zhi zhing mthun rkyen spel

analyzed: rnam bzhi phrin las sgrub ba mdzod
